Question: This person's fame in the United States was matched for a time in the United Kingdom.
Hints: In 1956, this person had his first international engagement, playing successfully in Havana, Cuba.
Television specials were made from this person's show at the Las Vegas Hilton in 1978 and 1979 which were broadcast on CBS.
The ____ Foundation, which provides college scholarships to up-and-coming performers, continued to function.
